thread.title: Varun Dhawan Urges People To Help Put Girls Back In School
thread.title_full: Varun Dhawan Urges People To Help Put Girls Back In School

title: Varun Dhawan Urges People To Help Put Girls Back In School
text:
facebook 
Did you know that one in five girls in India is forced to quit school because of menstruation? Yes, that's 20% of the female student population. And that too because of something that is biologically intrinsic, and should not hold us back from doing what we need to do. 
Actor Varun Dhawan posted a tweet supporting the cause by giveher5.org, an organisation which is helping families put their girls back in school. Help put a girl child back in school iv done my bit do urs pic.twitter.com/mpXRIBqGx4 â€” Varun Badri Dhawan (@Varun_dvn) March 5, 2017 
Now, that's a responsible way to use one's fame. Image credit : Pinterest
